name: currentsong
title: CurrentSong
author: Paco Hobi
description: Save current playing song from pandora.com to a text file
author: Paco Hobi

preferences.name: infoFormat
preferences.title: Format
preferences.description:
Format of the saved song information:
	%song% will be replaced by the song name
	%artist% will be replaced by the artist name
	%album% will be replaced by the album name

preferences.name: saveFile
preferences.title: File
preferences.description: Path of the file in which the song info will be saved
